description: Table showing the number of clients (aged 18 and over) and carers (caring for an adult aged 18 and over) receiving direct payments during 2008-09 from the Council with Adult Social Services Responsibilities (CASSR's). 1 p. II. Table showing the number of clients (aged 18 and over) receiving personal budgets and direct payments at 31st March 2009 from the Council with Adult Social Services Responsibilities (CASSR's). 1 p.
